content.raw:
FYI, I got a crash on shutdown when trying this PR which points to `Scene3D`. Not sure if it's related to the PR though:

```
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(0x7fb155e24f20) [0x7fb155e24f20]                                                                                                      
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5(0x7fb150a69e50) [0x7fb150a69e50]                                                                                            
/home/chapulina/ign_ws/install/lib/ign-gazebo-2/plugins/gui/libGzScene3D.so(_ZN8ignition6gazebo2v212RenderThread8ShutDownEv+0x55) [0x7fb117100b35] /home/chapulina/ign_ws/src/ig
n-gazebo/src/gui/plugins/scene3d/Scene3D.cc:768                                                                                                             
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5(_ZN7QObject5eventEP6QEvent+0xe2) [0x7fb150a6d122]                                                                 
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5(_ZN16QCoreApplication15notifyInternal2EP7QObjectP6QEvent+0x101) [0x7fb150a3d991]                                  
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5(_ZN23QCoreApplicationPrivate16sendPostedEventsEP7QObjectiP11QThreadData+0x1ed) [0x7fb150a4011d]                    
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5(0x7fb150a972c3) [0x7fb150a972c3]                                                                            
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0(g_main_context_dispatch+0x2e7) [0x7fb14d510417]                                                            
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0(0x7fb14d510650) [0x7fb14d510650]                                                                            
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libglib-2.0.so.0(g_main_context_iteration+0x2c) [0x7fb14d5106dc]                                                                          
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5(_ZN20QEventDispatcherGlib13processEventsE6QFlagsIN10QEventLoop17ProcessEventsFlagEE+0x5f) [0x7fb150a968ef]                
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5(_ZN10QEventLoop4execE6QFlagsINS_17ProcessEventsFlagEE+0x13a) [0x7fb150a3b9ea]                               
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5(_ZN7QThread4execEv+0x6a) [0x7fb15085a22a]                                                                   
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libQt5Core.so.5(0x7fb15085f16d) [0x7fb15085f16d]                                                                                
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libpthread.so.0(start_thread+0xdb) [0x7fb155bce6db]                                                                                 
/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6(clone+0x3f) [0x7fb155f0788f] ../sysdeps/unix/sysv/linux/x86_64/clone.S:95 
```
